universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface WidgetGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Slideable, Widget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditLayout, FrameLayoutWidget, GridViewWidget, HorizontalScrollViewWidget, InputLayout, LinearLayoutWidget, ListViewWidget, RecyclerViewWidget, RelativeLayoutWidget, ScrollViewWidget, SearchView, SpinnerLayout, ViewPagerWidget, WebViewWidget

    public interface WidgetGroup
extends Widget, Slideable
    Interface for the widget groups presented within the UI library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface universum.studios.android.ui.widget.Widget

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isHideSoftKeyboardOnTouchEnabled()
      Checks whether this view group hides the soft keyboard on its touch or not.
      void setHideSoftKeyboardOnTouchEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Specifies a boolean flag indicating whether this view group should request hiding of the soft keyboard whether it is touched.

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.ui.widget.Widget

        animateSize

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.ui.widget.Slideable

        getFractionX, getFractionY, setFractionX, setFractionY

    • Method Detail

      • setHideSoftKeyboardOnTouchEnabled

        void setHideSoftKeyboardOnTouchEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Specifies a boolean flag indicating whether this view group should request hiding of the soft keyboard whether it is touched.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to hide soft keyboard automatically on touch, false otherwise.

      • isHideSoftKeyboardOnTouchEnabled

        boolean isHideSoftKeyboardOnTouchEnabled()
        Checks whether this view group hides the soft keyboard on its touch or not.
        Returns:
        True if this view group will hide soft keyboard on its touch automatically, false otherwise.
